name: The Ball Game (Mobilizes)
description:
Hello, this is my first game jam submission for My First Game Jam, Winter 2022. It's not the best game in the world, nor is it even good. But here is my result.

BGM by = http://www.abstractionmusic.com/ ( Ludum Dare 38 - Track 1 )

Assets = https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer

Find 6 void shards to win the game.
